title: By the King a proclamation for remouing the receipt of His Maiesties exchequer from Westminster to Richmond.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: "Giuen at the Court at Ricot the one and thirtieth day of Iulie, in the first yeare of his Maiesties Raigne of great Brittaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
